name: the very long way to the door
name_original: the very long way to the door
description:
A very simple game done for the #BitsyJam on "overdue library books".

Use the arrow keys or WASD to move around and interact.

This is my first bitsy game, and it's meant to show how I feel like whenever I have to go somewhere new. I tried to play with the same effect @saranomy used for "I heard a dog barking", but maybe add some extra challenge there.

Still lots to learn about storytelling and pacing there, I kinda just dumped a bunch of exposition at the beginning. Had some cool ideas for having thoughts show up while you wandered the maze, especially when you reach a dead end, but I ran out of time to actually do it. 😅
